{"id":1701651704,"question_id":445,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 days, 16 hours","timestamp":1752776478,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1701651704/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"79.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        if(l1 == 0 && l2 == 0) return nullptr;\n        if(l1 == 0) return l2;\n        if(l2 == 0) return l1;\n\n        stack<int> s1;\n        int c1 = 1, c2 = 1;\n        stack<int> s2;\n        ListNode* temp = l1;\n        while(temp){\n            s1.push(temp -> val);\n            temp = temp -> next;\n            c1++;\n        }\n        temp = l2;\n        while(temp){\n            s2.push(temp -> val);\n            temp = temp -> next;\n            c2++;\n        }\n\n        int carry = 0;\n        ListNode* head = nullptr;\n        \n        while (!s1.empty() || !s2.empty() || carry != 0) {\n            int a = 0, b = 0;\n            if (!s1.empty()) {\n                a = s1.top();\n                s1.pop();\n            }\n            if (!s2.empty()) {\n                b = s2.top();\n                s2.pop();\n            }\n            int sum = a + b + carry;\n            int digit = sum % 10;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            \n            // Create a new node and insert at head\n            ListNode* newNode = new ListNode(digit);\n            newNode->next = head;\n            head = newNode;\n        }\n        return head;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":252}
